item.title: 021 - Starbucks Screens
item.description: My last year in high school and a few years through college, I worked at Starbucks. It was a pretty great job as far as customer service went. My town happened to have one of the first Starbucks’ with a hot-food oven and a drive-through. [Continue Reading]
